chinese: 我住在一个古老小镇上, 被美丽的树林环绕着.
english: I live in a very old town which is surrounded by beautiful woods.

chinese: 这是一个著名的风景胜地.
english: It is a famous beauty spot.

chinese: 每适星期天,有成百的人从城里来观赏我们的小镇,
english: On Sundays, hundreds of people come from the city to see our town
and to walk through the woods.

chinese: 游客已被告知要保持树林的整洁.
english: Visitors have been asked to keep the woods clean and tidy.

chinese: 树下都已设置了废物筐,
english: Litter baskets have been placed under the trees,

chinese: 但是人们仍到处扔垃圾.
english: but people still throw their rubbish everywhere.

chinese: 上星期三我到树林里去散步.
english: Last Wednesday, I went for a walk in the woods.

chinese: 我所见到的一切使我非常难过.
english: What I saw made me very sad.

chinese: 我数了一下,有7辆旧汽车和3个旧冰箱.
english: I counted seven old cars and three old refrigerators.

chinese: 而满地都是纸片、烟头、旧轮胎,
english: and the ground was covered with pieces of paper, cigarette ends, old tyres,

chinese: 空瓶子和生锈的空罐头盒.
在垃圾中我发现了一块牌子,上面写着：
english: Among the rubbish, I found a sign which said,

chinese: “凡在此树林里丢弃垃圾者,将依法处置.”
english: Anyone who leaves litter in these woods will be prosecuted!'
